| key                  | function                                |
|----------------------|-----------------------------------------|
| super+b\B            | next\previous wallpaper                 |
| super+h\j\k\l        | focus on different window               |
| super+H\J\K\L        | move window                             |
| super+o              | split horizon                           |
| super+v              | split vertical                          |
| super+f              | fullscreen                              |
| super+s              | container layout stacked                |
| super+w              | container layout tabbed                 |
| super+e              | container layout toggle split           |
| super+shift+space    | floating / tiling toggle                |
| super+space          | switch floating window toggle           |
| super+shift+minus    | move windown as scratchpad              |
| super+minus          | switch scratchpad window toggle         |
| super+a              | focus the parent container              |
| super+1/2/3....      | change workspace                        |
| super+shift+1/2/3... | move container to workspace             |
| super+C              | reload                                  |
| super+R              | restart                                 |
| super+E              | exit i3                                 |
| super+r              | resize mode ;then use h/j/k/l to resize |
